name: Ampersand Energy
description:
Ampersand is Africa's first electric transport energy company with the longest and most successful track record of serving a commercial e-motorcycle fleet and battery swapping network at scale. 
Since Ampersand was founded in 2016, it has grown to be best in class for technology and performance, with hundreds of employees and a presence in Rwanda and Kenya. Ampersand is leading the way for affordable, low-carbon public transport, creating green jobs.
slogan: Africa's market leader in powering and supplying commercial-use electric motorcycles.
